t: Check out this Amazon review of Pocket Prestige Waiters Corkscrew By Coutale Sommelier - Naturalwood - French Patented Spring-Loaded Double Lever Wine Bottle Opener for Bartenders and Gifts - Sharp Micro-Serrated Knife
s: I've been using Coutale wine openers ... like the brand, however, the "Pocket" I received recently has a defective worm - the point is out of alignment with the rest of the worm. It makes inserting into the cork more difficult and the cork is prone to breakage during removal. Hopefully the replacement will not have the same issue. Update: I got a replacement from Amazon and it had the same issue. I will not be keeping either. ... Pocket Prestige Waiters Corkscrew By Coutale Sommelier - Naturalwood ...
